mean_cn: adj. 交替的，轮流的，间隔的；  v. （使）交替，（使）轮流；  n. 代替者
mean_en: (of two things) happening or following one after the other regularly; if something happens on alternate days, nights, etc. it happens on one day, etc. but not on the next
sentence: This is a week of alternate sunshine and rain.
word_etyma: altern其他的，改变状态 + ate表示做、造成 → 交替的，轮流的；间隔的
